page.name: Story

children.value: The story begins with a hot pot dinner. Anthony had to pick Mai up for the meetup and then it was love at first sight. After that day, Anthony and Mai kept in touch everyday and the rest is history.
Rainy day at the mall and eating jajangmyeon.

properties.title: What was your most memorable date?

children.value: Seeing Mt Fuji together and walking around the Kawaguchiko Music Forest.

properties.title: In what ways are you most alike?

children.value: We have a similar sense of dark humor and love South Park.

properties.title: In what ways are you most different?

children.value: He’s an aquarius and she’s a scorpio.

properties.title: What is your favorite activity together?

children.value: Playing Overwatch, Animal Crossing, Pokemon, and Stardew Valley together. We also like to make scrapbooks and build legos.

properties.title: What is a life goal of ours?

children.value: To buy a home in Japan and adopt a bird.

page.description: Learn all about Anthony and Mai's wedding here.
